title: Chapter 5: A Closer Look at rclpy
description: Throughout this module, we've been using the rclpy library to write our ROS 2 nodes in Python. rclpy (ROS Client Library for Python) is the official Python client library for ROS 2. It provides a high-level, Pythonic interface to the underlying C++ libraries and the ROS 2 middleware, allowing you to build complex robotics applications with ease.
